description: Explore the intricate relationship between open-source licensing and cybersecurity strategies. Discover how organizations can enhance their cyber defenses by effectively leveraging open-source software, understanding legal risks, and implementing strategic risk management solutions.
keywords: open source licensing, cybersecurity, cyber defense, OSS, open-source software, licenses, GNU General Public License, Apache License, MIT License, BSD License, risk management, Snort, Metasploit, sustainable funding, open-source projects
title: Open Source Licensing in Cyber Defense
